test_message: Analyzing driver's license image: slight glare detected on top right corner, document angle is 5 degrees tilted left, text mostly readable except DOB field

corrective_guidance: Adjust the document to minimize glare, especially on the top-right corner.
Rotate the document slightly to the right to align it horizontally.
Ensure the entire document is well-lit and flat to improve text legibility, especially over the DOB field.
